content: I'm very confused about how to have a categorical discussion, for example if I want to prove a theorem,in the proof,I want to have a discussion about whether a set s is non-empty or not, what tactic should I try to use to do that?
by_cases perhaps? Can you give an example of an argument you want to formalize?
Thanks you a lot.I think use by_cases may solve this problem.
Kevin Wen has marked this topic as resolved.
